title: Reddit Live Thread loads slow
content:
The below live thread has always, since the start of its creation back at the outbreak of the war (so Feb/Mar 2022 time-frame) loaded slow and continues to load slow in FF (all version since then until now) and it loads a lot faster in Chromium based browsers. I've never personally dug into the page loading, but some aspects of how it renders embedded tweets seem super slow, and that's nothing to do with any changes Elon has made recently to Twitter/X... like I said, it been happening since Feb/Mar 2022 when the live thread was first created.

https://www.reddit.com/live/18hnzysb1elcs/

I just think that live thread is a great test case on where Firefox can measure and maybe improve some page load and render times.
creator: mooky1977

title: Problem with Firefox on assurancewireless.com
content:
I cannot access the login page on assurancewireless.com. I get a 500 error and the attached message shows that there is also a 404 error.

Things I've tried: Disabling enhanced tracking Safe mode Disabling uBlock Incognito mode

None of these work. It simply will not load that page.

The site works perfectly in Chrome, but it's a pain to have to use Chrome for just that one site. How can I report this error to technical so it can get fixed?

title: What are the units for font size in the setttings page?
content: The settings page just shows a number, but no units as on my laptop's default font settings page. I think that they are pixels, but I'm not sure. I want to set my font sizes in points, so that the text will appear the same size on my laptop's screen as on my much larger external monitor.

title: Falha ao acessar o gov.br usando certificado digital (token)
content:
Quando tento logar no gov.br usando o certificado digital (token A3) aparece o seguinte erro:

Falha na conexão segura

Ocorreu um erro durante uma conexão com certificado.sso.acesso.gov.br. O sistema remoto informa falha na verificação de assinatura ou na troca de chaves.

Código do erro: SSL_ERROR_DECRYPT_ERROR_ALERT 

   A página que você está tentando ver não pode ser exibida porque a autenticidade dos dados recebidos não pôde ser comprovada.    Entre em contato com os responsáveis pelo site para informar este problema.
creator: leonardosantosoliveira

title: Incoming  mail

title: How to turn off autofill when it's not password related?
content:
Every time I log on a site where I have previously searched something in their search bar, whatever I searched either gets auto-filled (even if I want to search something else) or appears in the bottom of the search bar. They disappear if I clear all my search history but then I have to re-log into every site on my browser.

How can I delete those suggestions/make them not appear anymore without loging out? I have tried checking the autofill settings but everything is password related.

title: Support for transparent images when copy-and-pasting
content:
hello! i'm looking for a way to adjust the settings, if there are any, to copy and paste PNG images with firefox and keep their transparency intact -- rather than the solid black it has now. as i understand it there's been similar issues as of 8 months ago, but i'm unsure if anything else has changed in that time.

i'm not a full-on graphic designer or anything but i do use this fairly often as an artist to look at references and such, and as someone who's recently switched to firefox from chrome (which does support this feature) i'd like to know if it's as easy as clicking something in a menu or if that's not an option altogether. thank you in advance to anyone willing to help!

title: Youtube Video Player Not Loading
content:
Hi all,

Recently, I was having issues with Youtube videos not buffering/loading after they have been playing. A quick refresh on the page seemed to help and it hasn't happened since.

However, in going to open a new video, everything on the page loads BUT the actual video player. I've cleared everything I could, disabled the ublock extension I had to stop ads, and also disabled the hardware accelerator that was suggested in an article I found.

Despite all this, the page does not finish loading yet it acts as if it has. I've added a screenshot.

No issues using Chrome.

Thanks for any help and suggestions!
creator: whoward92

title: Is there a way to make control-shift-t prioritize tabs over windows?
content: I recently discovered that the shortcut control-shift-t will reopen recently closed windows as well as recently closed tabs, and that recently closed windows take priority over recently closed tabs. This isn't particularly convenient for how I tend to use multiple tabs and windows, and I would like to find a way to change the priority so that a recently closed tab would be reopened before a recently closed window. Alternatively, if there's a separate command that will only reopen recently closed tabs, that would be useful instead.
creator: avirubinoff
